name: api-snippet-generator-mcp
description: MCP server for API Snippet Generator - exposes snippet generation and marketplace tools to AI assistants and IDEs

scripts.build: tsc mcp-server.ts --outDir dist --target es2022 --module esnext --moduleResolution bundler --allowSyntheticDefaultImports
scripts.test: echo "Testing MCP server with mcp list tools" && echo '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":1,"method":"tools/list","params":{}}' | node dist/mcp-server.js

author: API Snippet Generator Team

server.name: api-snippet-generator
server.description: Generate and browse API documentation snippets
